error.model_not_multimodal: The selected model does not support image understanding. Image content may not be processed correctly.

session_status.generating: AI is generating and auto-saving the first reply. Some actions will unlock shortly.

import.success_message: Conversation has been imported to your mistake library
import.format_hint: Please select a JSON file exported via the Export Chat feature

notifications.view_exam_sheet_missing: No linked question set was found.
notifications.view_exam_sheet_navigating: Opening the linked question set and focusing on the related question…

dialog.title: Move conversation
dialog.description: Select a new subject. The conversation will be re-filed and detached from the insight graph.

notifications.success: Conversation moved to the new subject

errors.unsupported_mode: Move is only available in mistake detail mode

edit_dialog.title: Edit Message
edit_dialog.hint: Resend the conversation starting from this user message.

panel.subtitle: Select libraries for retrieval ({{selected}}/{{total}})
panel.toggle_other_subjects: Show note libraries from other subjects
panel.topk_helper: Controls how many documents are retrieved per query ({{min}}-{{max}})
panel.topk_disabled_hint: Adjust Top-K after document parsing completes or streaming stops
panel.rerank_helper: When enabled, retrieved results are semantically re-ranked to improve relevance
panel.multimodal_helper: When enabled, retrieval results include images and other multimodal content. Requires a multimodal model.
panel.topk_helper_short: Number of documents returned per query

advanced.notice: Applies to the next conversation only and resets after sending.

temperature.label: Temperature
temperature.description: Higher temperature produces more diverse outputs

context.label: Context Length
context.description: Controls how much conversation AI remembers

disable_tools.label: Disable Tools
disable_tools.helper: When enabled, this turn will not attach RAG, MCP, or user memory tools.

send_shortcut.label: Send shortcut
send_shortcut.helper: While using an IME (e.g. Chinese input), pressing Enter to confirm candidates will not send messages.

model.label: Secondary model
model.description: Choose an alternate model for this turn. Supports multimodal and text-only engines.

graph_toggle.label: Enable Graph RAG for this turn
graph_toggle.helper: Affects only this conversation. Listens on *_graph_sources channel.

enable_thinking.label: Enable Thinking
enable_thinking.helper: Enable reasoning mode for supported models

advanced.thinking_mode_notice: In reasoning mode, the temperature parameter may be ignored by the model.

model_panel.title: Second Model
model_panel.subtitle: Only affects the next newly started conversation and resets after you send.
model_panel.search_placeholder: Search by name or model ID...
model_panel.empty: No available models detected. Enable at least one text model under Settings → Model Setup.
model_panel.missing_default_hint: No default chat model configured. Go to Settings to choose one.

badges.system_default_tooltip: This model is set as the system default chat model

notifications.unsupported: Please save the mistake before generating a study summary
notifications.no_content: The model returned no summary content

parsing.title: Cards are streaming
parsing.desc: Model is still parsing the JSON payload

stack_preview.click_to_expand: Click to expand and view all cards

form.toggle_tooltip: Attach the selected card template and generation options to the next turn.
form.placeholder: Describe the cards you want to generate…
form.templates_empty: No templates available. Please create one in the template manager.
form.custom_requirements_placeholder: e.g. Prefer cloze deletions, include tags, highlight mistakes…

panel.title: Card mode
panel.parsing: The model is still generating cards…

messages.queue_missing_options: Template info is missing. Please wait for the parser to finish before pushing.
messages.queue_after_unavailable: AnkiConnect is offline. Cards have been saved to the material queue.
messages.import_missing_options: Please select a deck and note type before importing
messages.import_duplicate: Anki reported duplicates or skipped notes
messages.open_panel_failed: Unable to open the Anki panel: {{error}}
messages.attachment_trimmed: Template attachment exceeded 50KB. Card mode has been disabled until you simplify the template or requirements.
messages.error_generic: Model output does not match the expected card JSON.
messages.import_config_missing: Please configure Deck Name and Note Type in the Anki mode settings first

library.missing_id: Card id is missing. Please refresh and try again.
library.selection_required: Select at least one card first

editor.discard_confirm: You have unsaved edits. Discard them before leaving?
editor.saving_block: A card is still saving. Please wait.

handshake.sync_failed: Failed to refresh the card panel state. Please try again.

sidebar.title: Sessions
sidebar.close_confirm: Close this session? Unsaved changes will be lost.
